mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_ch_name, user_en_name, user_nickname, user_img, user_sex, user_mobile, user_email, `password`, ctime, auth, `status`) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userChName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set user_ch_name = #{userChName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_en_name = #{userEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_nickname = #{userNickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_img = #{userImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_mobile = #{userMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth = #{auth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_ch_name, user_en_name, user_nickname, user_img, user_sex, user_mobile, user_email, `password`, ctime, auth, `status` from user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
